advancement.creatania.root.desc: Creatania是一个新型魔法科技模组
advancement.creatania.mana_machine_compo: 获得一个魔力机壳，它是所有魔力机器的核心
advancement.creatania.mana_generator.des: 制作你的第一个魔导机器，现在你可以利用魔力液化器将惰性魔力流体转化为真实魔力
advancement.creatania.omni_gearbox.desc: 普通的齿轮箱逊爆了！现在试试万向齿轮箱！
advancement.creatania.manaduct_tier_1.de: 在物理的世界里传输魔力是非常低效的过程，而管道可以有效的缓解这种情况
advancement.creatania.manaduct_tier_2.de: 一个更加精密的管道能进一步减少传输损耗
advancement.creatania.manaduct_tier_3.de: 一个更好的精灵管道，亚尔夫海姆人对他们的东西运用的很熟练
advancement.creatania.manaduct_tier_4.de: 击败盖亚守护者是一件痛苦的事，而现在迎来了回报
advancement.creatania.mana_condenser.des: 你已经可以从大气中提取魔力了，尽管有点破坏平衡
advancement.creatania.mana_motor: 不要紧张... 你处理的很好
advancement.creatania.mana_motor.desc: 你已经具备将魔力转化为旋转力了
advancement.creatania.your_first_flowing: Item . creatania . molten brass bucket
Grabbing a Bucket of Molten Brass from a hot mixer
Item . creatania . molten gaia bucket
Grabbing a Bucket of Molten Gaia from a hot mixer

Grabbing a Bucket of Molten Manasteel from a hot mixer
Item . creatania . molten terrasteel bucket
Grabbing a Bucket of Molten Terrasteel from a hot mixer
Item . creatania . molten andesite bucket
Grabbing a Bucket of Molten Andesite from a hot mixer
Item . creatania . molten copper bucket
Grabbing a Bucket of Molten Copper from a hot mixer
Item . creatania . molten gold bucket
Grabbing a Bucket of Molten Gold from a hot mixer
Item . creatania . molten iron bucket
Grabbing a Bucket of Molten Iron from a hot mixer
Item . creatania . molten zinc bucket
Grabbing a Bucket of Molten Zinc from a hot mixer
Item . creatania . real mana bucket
Grabbing a Bucket of Real Mana from a hot mixer
Item . creatania . corrupt mana bucket
Grabbing a Bucket of Corrupt Mana from a hot mixer
Item . creatania . pure mana bucket
Grabbing a Bucket of Pure Mana from a hot mixer
advancement.creatania.lords_work.desc:
The llame llama lloser got what he deserves, thanks for your service§7
(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.creatania.buff_from_purified:
Purified mana might be inert, but still contains a lot of power within§7
(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.creatania.buff_from_real_man:
Botania mana blocks are the real deal, real condensed magical power§7
(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.creatania.debuff_from_corrup:
Corrupt mana might be inert, but still extremely dangerous§7
(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.creatania.botania_block_with:
Pick up blocks from botania using the create wrench. Be very careful with it§7
(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.creatania.prevent_ender_enti:
Corrupt mana blocks, among its many properties, can prevent ender entities from teleporting§7
(Hidden Advancement)
advancement.creatania.produce_mana_gel_f:
Produce mana gel by having a slime be hurt while touching pure mana§7
(Hidden Advancement)
